text: Dardan Mushkolaj (; born 2 October 1997), also known under the pseudonym Mister Dardy, is a German-Albanian rapper. == Life and career == Dardan Mushkolaj was born on 2 October 1997 into an Albanian family in the district Zuffenhausen of the city of Stuttgart, Germany. He rose to significant prominence in German-speaking Europe following the release of his first single "Telefon" in 2017. == Discography == === Albums === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
